column1: #text=Yesterday I used my new library card to borrow a book .
#text=I drove down to the library early in the morning , just as soon as the library opened .
#text=When I entered the library , I said hi to the lady behind the counter , and went over to the science fiction section to look for a book that might catch my fancy .
#text=I soon found a very good looking book about a boy who meets an alien in his backyard .
#text=I really wanted to read the book , but I knew it would take me a few days , so I decided to borrow it for awhile .
#text=I brought the book up to the lady at the counter , and she asked me for my library card .
#text=I showed it to her , and she entered some information in the computer .
#text=She told me to bring the book back in one week .
#text=I promised I would , then I thanked her and went home to read the book !
